titleStmt.title: A practical discourse concerning repentance and the nature of the Christian religion. By A. Lortie, rector of Barton, near Nottingham. Imprimatur, Oct. ult. 1692. Guil. Lancaster, R.P.D. Hen. Episc. Lond. à Sacris.
titleStmt.author: Lortie, André, d. 1706.

titleStmt.title: A practical discourse concerning repentance and the nature of the Christian religion. By A. Lortie, rector of Barton, near Nottingham. Imprimatur, Oct. ult. 1692. Guil. Lancaster, R.P.D. Hen. Episc. Lond. à Sacris.
titleStmt.author: Lortie, André, d. 1706.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Will. Rogers, at the Sun, over-against St. Dunstan's Church in Fleetstreet,

notesStmt.note: Caption title on p. 1 reads: A practical discourse concerning repentance, &c.
"A morning and evening prayer" has caption title on p. 99; "The recapitulation, .." has caption title on p. 116; register and pagination are continuous.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
